data.question: What is the main functionality of the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework?
data.answer: Selective CO2 capture and high proton conductivity.

data.question: What structural feature allows the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework to exhibit high proton conductivity?
data.answer: The hexagrammic channels formed by the regular triangular metallacycles.

data.question: Is the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework stable in water?
What method was used to synthesize the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework?
data.answer: Solvothermal reaction of CoII ions, oxalate anions, and the azpy ligand.

data.question: Does the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework exhibit slow magnetic relaxation?
What is the role of oxalate in the synthesis of the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework?
data.answer: Oxalate can bridge metal ions into a helix.

data.question: Is the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework's structure maintained after desolvation?
What is the activation energy for proton conduction in the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework?
Does the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework have a higher adsorption rate for CO2 compared to N2?
What mechanism is suggested for proton conduction in the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework?
Is the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework degraded by exposure to SO2 flow?
What is the Schläfli symbol for the structure of compound 1 when considering CoII ions as four-connected nodes?
Can the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework be used in proton exchange fuel cells?
What is the role of hydrazine groups in the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework?
data.answer: They contribute to forming a dense hydrogen-bonding network for proton conduction.

data.question: Is the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework's structure affected by exposure to weakly acidic media?
What is the zero-coverage heat of adsorption of CO2 for the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework?
Does the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework have a microporous system?
What is the maximum conductivity value achieved by the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework at 98% RH?
Is the Star-of-David catenane metal–organic framework's structure destroyed by exposure to high concentrations of H2O2?
What is the pitch of the helix formed by CoII ions and ox2− anions in the structure of compound 1?
